text: As a sales person, I want access to training materials for the products in the catalog
context: Critical for onboarding and product knowledge. Low technical lift with high user value.

text: As a sales person, I need to be able to place the order
context: Core functionality - must be seamless and error-free.

text: As a sales person, I want to add products to a cart without obstacles so that I can create a quote and make a sale
context: Fundamental e-commerce pattern. Reduces friction in the sales process.

text: As a sales person, I need to create a quote
context: Primary user task. Must support bulk operations.

text: As a sales person, I need the customer to know the order has been placed
As a sales person, I need to send an estimate to customers
As a sales person, I need to be able to track the progress of an order
context: Real-time status updates reduce support tickets.

text: As a sales person, I need to be able to build an order from a quote so that I can finish the sales process
context: Seamless conversion from quote to order is critical.

text: As a sales person, I want to be presented with potential enhancements to my cart
As a sales person, I want the cart to intelligently bundle products as I add them
context: Automatic bundle detection and pricing optimization.

text: As a solutions designer, I want to create a product so that it can be sold or added to bundles
context: Product creation workflow with validation and approval.

text: As a solutions architect, I want to establish API connections between BuSS and a vendor
As a sales person, I need to create a quote
context: Bulk quote creation for enterprise deals.

text: As a solutions designer, I want to create a bundle so that sales are efficient and structured
context: Complex bundle configuration with pricing rules.

text: As a sales person, I want to know about bundles based on my customer's needs so that I can build the best possible quote
context: AI-powered recommendations based on customer profile.

text: As a sales person, I want to see the discount rules being applied to my cart's products and bundles
As a sales person, I want to move products and services from one account line to another
As a solutions architect, I want to onboard a vendor so that their products can be added to the catalog
As a sales person, I want to freely browse the complete catalog of products and services so that I can learn or build carts
As a sales person, I want to clone an existing/older quote to use as a template for a new quote
As a sales person, I want to manage customer account to be able to merge, split, or consolidate
As a sales person, I want access to commissions and incentives data so that I know what I'm incentivized to sell
As a sales person, I want access to sales analytics for products and bundles in a dashboard or product view
As a solutions designer, I want to import multiple products at one time so that it doesn't take as long
As a sales person, I need to create a customer account on the fly so that I can build carts for them
As a solutions designer, I want to attach files from the vendor to the product record
As a sales person, I want to view comparisons between products so that I can make my own conclusions about which to sell
As a sales person, I need to know when an order has been completed
As a sales person, I need to know the order will be billed properly
As a sales person, I want to view customer feedback on products so that I can see possible problems
As a sales person, I want to know that everything is working as specified
As a solutions designer, I want to set pricing and margin options for bundles so that each channel gets its own pricing rules
context: Complex pricing engine with channel rules.

text: As a solutions designer, I want to see my product approved by a solutions administrator
